pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 3, 2016:

Montréal

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Greek Independence Day Parade in Montréal.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
